import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Nft } from '../../../models/nft'; @Component({ selector: '[nft-dual-card]', templateUrl: './nft-dual-card.component.html', }) export class NftDualCardComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nft: Nft = {}; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
NFT ID: {{ nft.id }}

{{ nft.title }}

Creator {{ nft.creator }}
$
Instant Price {{ nft.instant_price }} ETH
Last Bid

{{ nft.last_bid }} ETH

{{ nft.price | currency }}
Ending in
{{ nft.ending_in }}
